title: law subject in 1st sem
content:
For law subject in 1st sem, will it be MCQ in ESA also ? 

Are we supposed to memorize all those articles ? 

Any tips for studying this subject ?  

Will it be counted for cgpa ?

Thanks!

comments.body:
1. Yes
2. Not all of them.
3. Just read the Question bank questions, 99% of the questions come from that and there's just 50-100 questions per unit. This is perhaps the least effort taking subject in the uni tbh.
4. Yes it is counted in GPA, but the weightage will be a quarter of your main subjects (at least it was for us, not sure how it is now, check the course credits in pesuacademy).
